author: Bindu Shajan Perappadan
title: Coronavirus | Can drugs for Ebola be used to treat COVID-19?
description: What are the medicines being considered for the novel coronavirus pandemic?
content: The story so far: Globally unknown till under 200-days ago, the virus SARS-CoV-2, has today, according to the World Health Organization (WHO), caused the worlds largest pandemic. Over half-a-million people are under lockdown, over six lakh are infected and ne… [+7262 chars]
